content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am not obligated to reveal the details of the apartment. Let's stick to negotiating the rental price. What is the rental price you are proposing?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am proposing a monthly rental price of 700 Euro for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is too low for my liking. Let's hear another proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the location and size of the apartment, I will offer 750 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a better offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's hear another proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but considering the current market situation, I can offer 780 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While the offer is getting closer to my expectations, I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's hear another proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the current market situation, I can offer 800 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: The offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's hear another proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but considering the current market situation, I can offer 820 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany
